news.title: Labour celebrates close win over SNP as Reform surges in Hamilton by-election
news.summary: The ballot was held following the death of local MSP and government minister Christina McKelvie.

news.title: Why Reform was the other big winner in the Hamilton by-election
news.summary: Reform UK recorded their best ever parliamentary election result in Scotland - with a 26% share of the vote.

news.title: Bargain Hunt expert jailed for selling art to suspected Hezbollah financier
news.summary: Police investigators tracked suspicious transactions between the Middle East and London.

news.title: UK arrests made in international crackdown on financial influencers
news.summary: Hundreds of take down requests of social media posts are also made following a campaign by regulators.

news.title: Beckham's already in with the royals - and now he's scored a winner with a knighthood
news.summary: The ex-footballer appears to be in line for a knighthood, but he already has a close relationship with the royals.

news.title: Fraud culture was 'pervasive' at union, auditors say
news.summary: There was a "pervasive fraud environment" at Unite the Union, a report obtained by the BBC has concluded.

news.title: Spurs sack manager Postecoglou after Europa League win
news.summary: Ange Postecoglou is sacked as Tottenham manager 16 days after leading them to victory in the Europa League final.

news.title: Thunderstorm warning issued for large parts of England and Wales
news.summary: The Met Office warns frequent lightning, hail and strong, gusty winds will be additional hazards.

news.title: Norwegian doctor jailed for raping patients
news.summary: Arne Bye is sentenced to 21 years in prison for abusing his position to conduct inappropriate exams.

news.title: Defending champion Alcaraz into French Open final after Musetti quits
news.summary: Defending champion Carlos Alcaraz moves into the French Open final after Italian opponent Lorenzo Musetti retires injured in their semi-final.
